author: Steve McCaskill
title: Ofcom issues guidance to ITV over '5G conspiracy' comments
description: Eamonn Holmes' comments on This Morning were too 'ambigious', regulator says.
content:
Ofcom has sanctioned London Live and issued guidance to ITV over two separate broadcasts discussing the widely-discredited conspiracy that 5G networks are a threat to human health.
An investigation by the regulator found London Lives interview with David Ick… [+3204 chars]
